item.title: 【Music Videos】PACK - Apple Music Videos Collection @ 2160p/HEVC & 1080p/AVC
item.description:
After some comparison between Apple Music and others like Tidal, YouTube Premium, Vevo.... Apple Music still wins about bitrate and image quality. So, as I have Apple Music subscription and some tools to get the Music Videos directly from source without encoding, I'll share the raw files (.m4v) untouched. Feel free to comment to check the summary and ask for anything that you want to get from Apple Music.
I'm gonna add two links for each MV, the main link in on the title and the second one is with the hashtag (#) symbol. This thread is going to be constantly updated, request as you want ♥

Hidden Content:
You must reply before you can see the hidden data contained here.
item.author: itunesboy
